New Records: Texas Rangers won their first World Series title
Marcus Semien hit a two-run home run
Corey Seager was named World Series MVP
Key Match Events: Diamondbacks' Zac Gallen had a no-hit inning
Rangers scored 5 runs in the ninth inning
Pre-Game Insights: Texas Rangers had not won a World Series since 1961
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Bruce Bochy celebrated his fourth World Series win
Corey Seager expressed pride in the team's resilience
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game 5 was the decisive match in a best-of-seven series
Corey Seager became one of four players with multiple World Series MVPs
Others: The game was played at Chase Field in Phoenix, Arizona
